title: relive 2016 worlds

embed.description: Samsung Galaxy's journey is the type of run every fan of every fringe team dreams of -- every team perpetually in fourth or fifth -- just once, you wish they'd knock off one of the favorites. And here was Samsung Galaxy -- a squad that helped knock off American favorite TSM in Groups, and then endured boos in Chicago before downing C9.

body: hey i really like the little music track that plays, is there anyway i can get it say for like download purposes?

replies.body: Hmmmm I'm not 100% sure what that particular song was, but I'm gonna do my best to poke a few other people to see if I can find out for you!!
yes plz i rlly like the music and itd be cool if i could like download it on my computer/phone or something
